abstract.text: Returns a new long short-term memory (LSTM) parameters structure from the specified parameters.

The number of input and output samples.
The number of stacked LSTM layers.
The size of the sequential input.

The descriptor of the input gate, which uses default sigmoid activation. Use C style multidimensional array notation to order the memory pointers as
The descriptor of the forget gate, which uses default sigmoid activation. Use C style multidimensional array notation to order the memory pointers as
The descriptor of the candidate gate, which uses default tanh activation. Use C style multidimensional array notation to order the memory pointers as
The descriptor of the output gate, which uses default sigmoid activation. Use C style multidimensional array notation to order the memory pointers as
Hidden activation function, which uses default tanh activation.

abstract.text: Make large-scale mathematical computations and image calculations, optimized for high performance and low energy consumption.
A set of parameters that describe common activation functions.
A structure that contains the input-output, hidden, and cell state n-dimensional array descriptors for a long short-term memory (LSTM) layer.
The descriptor of the cell-state input-output.
The descriptor of the hidden input-output.
A structure that describes a long short-term memory (LSTM) gate layer.
A structure that contains the parameters of a long short-term memory (LSTM) layer.
The number of input and output samples.
Returns a new long short-term memory (LSTM) parameters structure.
Returns a new long short-term memory (LSTM) parameters structure from the specified parameters.
Descriptors of the input, hidden input, and cell-state input data.
Descriptors of the output, hidden output, and cell-state output data.
The size of the sequential input.
A structure that describes the shape, stride, data type, and, optionally, the memory location of an n-dimensional array.
A pointer that is optional and points to the underlying data.
